item.title: Jamie add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "life is short but it is wide. this too shall pass." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Richard Llewellyn
item.description: "O, there is lovely to feel a book, a good book, firm in the hand, for its fatness holds rich promise, and you are hot inside to think of good hours to come." -- Richard Llewellyn

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I'm sorry for my inability to let unimportant things go, for my inability to hold on to the important things." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Diane Setterfield
item.description: "People disappear when they die. Their voice, their laughter, the warmth of their breath. Their flesh. Eventually their bones. All living memory of them ceases. This is both dreadful and natural. Yet for some there is an exception to this annihilation. For in the books they write they continue to exist. We can rediscover them. Their humor, their tone of voice, their moods. Through the written word they can anger you or make you happy. They can comfort you. They can perplex you. They can alter you. All this, even though they are dead. Like flies in amber, like corpses frozen in the ice, that which according to the laws of nature should pass away is, by the miracle of ink on paper, preserved. It is a kind of magic." -- Diane Setterfield

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Shelby Foote
item.description: "A university is just a group of buildings gathered around a library." -- Shelby Foote

item.title: Jamie add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "He who believes in Him is not condemned;but he who does not believe in Him is condemned already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten son of God" -- Anonymous
